Title: Relates to the number of judges of the family court in St. Lawrence county
Summary: Relates to the number of judges of the family court in St. Lawrence county; adds an additional judge at the same compensation rate.
LawCode: Amd ยง131, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to the number of judges of the family court in St. Lawrence county
